Articles.Content:
Hey everyone!

Was looking for another way to spend some of my limited free time, and I decided to make a documentary series about the history of the KSP.

I've made a quick "pilot episode" to gauge interest, get ideas, etc.

THINGS TO NOTE BEFORE WATCHING:

- I've tried to make my voice more documentary-like but my Australian accent doesn't help. May need to find someone else to do the narration.

- This pilot episode is not funny. A proper series (including a new first episode) would be based on suggestions and would portray the KSP as completely ridiculous. This episode is just to show the concept.

- I didn't want to write music for a series that may not happen if nobody is interested so instead I've used music I wrote for my band that really doesn't suit.

AAAAAnyway.... here's the pilot/concept episode. Let me know your thoughts.

http://youtu.be/EQGyZvgMYuI
